# genesyscloud_learning_modules (Data Source)

Data source for Genesys Cloud Learning Modules. Select a Learning Module by name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "genesyscloud_learning_modules" "example_learning_module" {
  name = "Learning Module name"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Learning Module name.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
